## Math for some basic modeling concepts

OLS model: $\begin{align} y_{i} &= \alpha + \beta x_{i} + \varepsilon_{i}\end{align}$ 

Residual sum of squares: $\begin{align} \sum\limits_{i}^{N} \varepsilon_{i} &= \sum\limits_{i}^{N} \left(  y_{i} -  \alpha - \beta x_{i} \right) \end{align}$
